prompts.name: Stitch Ice Cream Sunset
prompts.prompt: {ID_REF} ultra-photoreal winter dusk portrait. Woman and cute blue Stitch character lying on fresh snow, long glossy dark hair, wearing plush light-blue faux-fur coat and matching fluffy earmuffs. Soft snowfall. Both holding ice cream cones. Background: warm golden Christmas tree lights with strong bokeh. Camera: 50mm f/1.8.

prompts.name: Arched Window Red Gown
prompts.prompt: {ID_REF} ultra-photoreal luxury Christmas studio portrait. Woman with long dark-blonde hair sits on a rope swing inside a large arched window. Vivid red evening gown, high slit, red stiletto sandals. Set: rich red/green/gold garlands, warm fairy lights.

prompts.name: Stitch Cookie Monster
prompts.prompt: {ID_REF} cozy Christmas kitchen. Woman baking. Beside her a realistic fur blue alien (Stitch-like) wearing santa hat, eyes wide, covered in flour and cookie crumbs. 35mm wide angle, warm interior.

note: Complete 120 prompts catalog in production-ready format. Follow the {ID_REF} pattern for all generations.
